item.description:
This meeting will be postponed until further notice. We need more people who are willing to present and discuss their recent progress with open source projects !!

Open source and commercial CMS products are welcome!

We still need presenters for future meetings. If you are interested in presenting, please contact the organizers.


TENTATIVE

The next monthly meeting of WebCMS will focus on commercial add-ons for Joomla and reports on Drupal status and development directions from the Barcelona conference.

Rich will present some demonstrations of the iJoomla commercial add-on applications for Jomla, including iJoomla Magazine, iJoomla Survey, iJoomlaNews, and iJoomlaSideBars.

Lisa will give a brief report on the DrupalCon conference in Barcelona.

We need more presenters for Joomla, Drupal, Plone, and other CMS products!!

If you want to present or know people who are willing, please let us know.

Thank you.

Boston Web Content Management Systems User Group


We look forward to meeting you.

group.name: The Web Content Management Systems Meetup Group

item.name: The Web Content Management Systems Meetup
